title: Why do I have to be level 6 or 7 to post in some subforums?
body: And how do I get these levels? Mostly curious.

replies.body: It's tied to your league account, but it may need to sync up to the boards when posting for the first time.  You should be all sync'd up now, though, your name is a bit inappropriate.  :(  I hate to be that guy, but I flagged your name for a change but you can pick something a bit less vulgar when you relog to the client.
Alright, but on some browsers, I cannot upvote.
